section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this part, the term:

para.text: “Fund” means the Teen Pregnancy Prevention Fund established in § 1-325.322.
“Grant-managing entity” means the DC Campaign to Prevent Teen Pregnancy, as authorized by § 1-325.325.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) addition of this part, see § 5152-5156 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-377, July 14, 2014, 61 DCR 7598, 20 STAT 3696).

For temporary (90 days) addition of this part, see §§ 5142-5147 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-449, October 10, 2014, 61 DCR 10915, 20 STAT 4188).

For temporary (90 days) addition of this part, see §§ 5142-5147 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-566, January 9, 2015, 62 DCR 884, 21 STAT 541).
